name: Kuromi's House
description:
Your Friend Has Lost Their Notebooks Again But Not In The Way You Think...

You See, Baldi Has Also Lost Some Of His Stuff Because They Were Stolen. Same Goes With The Notebooks Too. And Obviously From The Title, You Will Need To Get The Stuff From "Kuromi's House" A House That No One Dares To Go In. Hopefully You Leave Successfully With The Stuff. BUT BE CAREFUL Since There Are Other People And Characters Too...
